lead_paragraph: Nepal has named two Himalayan peaks near Mount Everest after Sir Edmund Hillary and Sherpa Tenzing Norgay and opened them to foreigners for climbing, a month after a deadly avalanche killed 16 sherpa guides.

headline.main: Nepal Opens Peaks Named After Hillary, Tenzing to Foreign Climbers
headline.print_headline: Nepal Opens Peaks Named After Hillary, Tenzing to Foreign Climbers

snippet: Nepal has named two Himalayan peaks near Mount Everest after Sir Edmund Hillary and Sherpa Tenzing Norgay and opened them to foreigners for climbing, a month after a deadly avalanche killed 16 sherpa guides....
